member.name: IDCompositionVisualDebug.DisableHeatMap
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisualDebug.DisableRedrawRegions
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisualDebug.EnableHeatMap
member.summary: Enables a visual heatmap that represents overdraw regions.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisualDebug.EnableRedrawRegions
member.summary: Enables highlighting visuals when content is being redrawn.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.
